ctlab.dgraph

Class DynamicGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctlab.dgraph.DynamicGraph

  • public class DynamicGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements an algorithm for fully dynamic connectivity. It allows to add edges, remove edges and check connectivity between arbitrary vertices as well as check that overall graph is connected. The only limitation is that number of vertices must be fixed at the moment of object construction.

      • DynamicGraph

        public DynamicGraph(int n)
        Constructs a new dynamic graph with n vertices. Vertices are numbered from 0 to n - 1.

      • add

        public DynamicGraph.EdgeToken add(int v,
                                  int u)
        Adds an edge between vertices v and u to the graph.
        Parameters:
        v - a vertex
        u - a vertex
        Returns:
        a token that could be used to remove the edge from the graph

      • remove

        public void remove(DynamicGraph.EdgeToken token)
        Removes previously added edge from the graph. The operation requires a token of corresponding addition operation. Applying this method twice on the same token has no effect.
        Parameters:
        token - a token
